translations.Be_the_first_who_like_it: Be the first who like it
translations.Name: Name
translations.Categories_description: Space Categories will appear inside the categories tab on your dashboard and as tabs in the space directory. They can be used to group together related spaces.
translations.already_have_an_Docspace_account?_log_in: Already have an Docspace account? Log in
translations.Permissions the group: Permissions for this space for all members of the group.
translations.Permissions to individual users: Grant permissions to individual users, regardless of which group they are members of.
translations.Permissions to not authorized: If your Docspace is public, you can grant permissions to people who are not authorized on the site.
translations.Blog posts are a great: Blog posts are a great way to share announcements, status reports or other important news with your team.
translations.Start with an empty space: Start with an empty space and configure it for your project, team, department or company. You can add content using the pages and store them arranged in a hierarchy.
translations.Cooperation and exchange of resources wi: Cooperation and exchange of resources with your team
translations.Share knowledge, work together: Share knowledge, work together on projects, processes and procedures with your team. They will be notified of this space and all its updates. Members of the team will be granted access and will be added as observers of the space.
translations.Exchange of successful experience in sol: Exchange of successful experience in solving typical problems
translations.Share the knowledge and methods: Share the knowledge and methods of successful problem solving with your team or organization. Use it as a guide to methods for solving typical problems.
translations.Create and manage technical documentatio: Create and manage technical documentation for your products
translations.Creation, management and joint work: Creation, management and joint work on technical documentation. The documentation space has a structured tree of pages, which makes navigating the content easy.
translations.Share news and announcements with your t: Share news and announcements with your team
translations.Warning_page_delete_short: Are you sure you want to send this page to the trash? Please note:
translations.Warning_page_delete_long: Removing a page moves it into the trash. You can speak to your space administrator to have it recovered.
translations.Warning_space_delete_short: Deleting a space will delete all its content (including pages, comments, attachments and blogposts)
translations.Warning_space_delete_long: This operation cannot be undone. Once the space is deleted, it cannot be retrieved. It will be gone forever.Are you sure you want to delete this space?
